# dns-he-net_mx (Data Source)

DNS MX record

## Example Usage

```terraform
# Retrieve MX record.
resource "dns-he-net_mx" "example" {
  id      = 123456789
  zone_id = 123456
}
```

- `id` (Number) dns.he.net record id
- `zone_id` (Number) dns.he.net zone id
